LibraryCompositionByRnaClass

                                    org.apache.log4j.Logger log)
                             throws java.io.IOException
Constructor establishes locations of files and counts total reads per sample

Parameters:
genomeBowtieIndexBase - Genome fasta file
rnaClasses - Map associating RNA class name with fasta file of sequences
read1fastqs - Fastq file containing read1 if paired or single end reads if unpaired
read2fastqs - Fastq file containing read2 if paired or null if unpaired
log - Logger object
Throws:
java.io.IOException
Method Detail

getTotalReadCounts

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getTotalReadCounts()
Get the total number of reads per sample

Returns:
Map associating sample name with read count; regardless of whether reads are paired, the count is total single reads

readsPaired

public boolean readsPaired()
Whether the reads are paired

Returns:
True if paired, false if unpaired

alignAndGetCounts

                                                                                                           java.lang.String logDir)
                                                                                                    throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                                                           java.lang.InterruptedException
For each sample, get counts of reads mapping to each RNA class as well as genome and unmapped

Parameters:
samtoolsExecutable - Samtools executable file
bowtie2Executable - Bowtie2 executable file
bowtie2options -
bowtie2BuildExecutable - Bowtie2-build executable file
logDir - Output directory for logs and alignments
Returns:
Map from sample name to class name to count
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.lang.InterruptedException
